Just as the flow of volcanic lava cannot be controlled or stopped, Lavva is not owned or controlled by anyone. Lavva lets people observe, understand, socialize and collaborate

The LAVVA team has developed a search engine that will change the way the world surfs the net! We’ve created a unique algorithm that works organically on the user level and adds the missing human element to browsing, transforming search from a pattern of keywords into a personalized social environment. Hence our motto, Go Social!

LAVVA has improved the way you retrieve information, empowering users with the ultimate information exchange and communication platform. We treat each search query as a unique request, producing top results based on users’ experiences, with an additional opportunity, if desired, to interact with others with the same immediate interests. That’s where LAVVA excels, at this experienced based search model.

Our vision is to create a socially driven and collaborative search engine where people can share their experiences and create a unique, democratic platform based on a currency of collective intelligence and experience.
